name: planetarian HD
description: planetarian HD is an engaging and emotional visual novel from legendary game studio, Key. A sub-brand of VisualArts, Key are also famed for creating Kanon, AIR, CLANNAD, Little Busters!, Rewrite, Angel Beats!, and Summer Pockets.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows® 10/8/7 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or higher Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 256MB Video Memory (with Pixel Shader 2.0) DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Required
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows® 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB Video Memory (with Pixel Shader 2.0) DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Required
